block.name: Calibrate Linear Array
block.doc: This block calibrates a uniform linear antenna array. The input stream to this block is the sample correlation matrix generated using the signals received across the array elements. Args: norm_spacing: Normalized spacing between antenna elements. That is, the shortest distance between antenna elements divided by wavelength of the carrier signal. num_ant_ele: Number of antenna array elements. pilot_angle: The known angle at which a pilot transmitter is located.
